alert.note: Alert for West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 9:55PM CST until January 16 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional light ice accumulation on elevated surfaces. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...West Cameron Parish. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call 511 for road information.
